alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 20 at 3:13AM PDT until March 21 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous boating conditions on area lakes during the advisory period. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Driving will be difficult for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind speeds will be strongest tonight through Monday morning with gusts 50 to 55 mph possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Postpone boating plans or stay in safe harbor during the advisory period. Secure outdoor objects.
